works.description: We have earlier introduced you to some of the most exotic and expensive Bugatti Veyrons. At the Shanghai Motor Show 2011, Bugatti released two new special versions of the Veyron. The first one in the line is a bespoke version of the 1,200hp Veyron 16.4 Super Sport. The special supercar flaunts black carbon fiber bodywork with inviting details such as the logos, alloy wheels, fuel filler cap and rear lid, finished in polished and anodized aluminum.
